text: Ivar Mauritz Aronsson (24 March 1928 - 6 February 2017) was a Swedish rower. He competed in the 1956 Summer Olympics. He won a silver medal in the coxed fours and finished fourth in the eights competition. He won two silver medals in these events at the 1955 European Championships. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Swedish sportspeople Category:Olympians for Sweden Category:Rowers
title: Ivar Aronsson
